file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 38-33-03-04 - MUFFLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MUFFLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the muffler assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 38-33-03-000-801-A MUFFLER ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL ALL 38-33-03-400-801-A MUFFLER ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 38-33-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-33-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MUFFLER ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the muffler assembly. (2) The muffler assembly is installed in the lavatory, and is part of the wash-basin drain system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the amenity dispenser assembly (AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Open the fire extinguisher compartment door in the wash-basin cabinet (AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Refer to DET. B and remove the muffler assembly as follows: (a) Remove the screw (1), washer (2), and spacer (3) from the clamp (4). (b) Loosen the clamp (5) of the muffler tube (6). (c) Remove the muffler tube (6) from the wash-basin drain valve. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-33-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (d) Remove the screw (7), washer (8), and spacer (9) from the clamp (10). (e) Remove the muffler (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-33-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Muffler Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE 271 A B DET. A 11. MUFFLER 4. CLAMP 2. WASHER 3. SPACER 7. SCREW 1. SCREW 10. CLAMP 8. WASHER 6. MUFFLER TUBE 9. SPACER DET. B 5. CLAMP 145AMM380013.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-33-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-33-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MUFFLER ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the muffler assembly. (2) The muffler assembly is installed in the lavatory, and is part of the wash-basin drain system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Refer to DET. B and install the muffler assembly as follows: (a) Install the muffler (11) in the clamp (10). (b) Install the screw (7), washer (8), and spacer (9) in the clamp (10). (c) Install the muffler tube (6) in the wash-basin drain valve. (d) Tighten the clamp (5) of the muffler tube (6). (e) Install the screw (1), washer (2), and spacer (3) in the clamp (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-33-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the amenity dispenser assembly (AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Close the fire extinguisher compartment door in the wash-basin cabinet (AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-33-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
